files.filename: [Problem Brief] Teammate Diagnosis of Merchant Issues (2).txt

themes: Pain points in diagnosing Merchant account management issues
Inefficiencies leading to slow resolutions and incomplete diagnoses
Need for improved tools to assist support teammates

suggestedArtifacts.name: Teammate Diagnostic Journey Map
suggestedArtifacts.description: Map the journey of teammates while diagnosing Merchant issues, highlighting pain points and opportunities for intervention.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: The data reveals numerous pain points and inefficiencies in the diagnosis process that can be effectively illustrated in a journey map.

suggestedArtifacts.name: Support Teammate Personas
suggestedArtifacts.description: Create detailed personas for different types of support teammates who interact with Merchant account issues.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: Different support teammates may have distinct roles and challenges which can be used to tailor tools and resources.

suggestedArtifacts.name: TruthFinder Feature Matrix
suggestedArtifacts.description: Detail the features of the proposed TruthFinder tool, including functionality mapping against the identified gaps in the diagnosis process.
suggestedArtifacts.reasoning: The proposed TruthFinder tool is essential to resolving current pain points, and a feature-matrix will clearly outline its utility.

dataSegments.name: Support Teammates
dataSegments.description: Teammates responsible for diagnosing and resolving Merchant account issues, facing challenges with the current diagnosis tools.
